message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you have a budget.  While $7,500 is below my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $8,500 to make this work. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a mutually beneficial deal.  Let me know your thoughts.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $8,250? I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
